content.raw: ~~While reviewing pull request #1212, we observed some seg-faults during transport teardown when running the `gz model -m <model_name> -p` command. The [backtrace is here](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/88368113cfad876724c5) and implicates [TopicManager::Fini at line 86](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/gz_model_info/gazebo/transport/TopicManager.cc#cl-86).~~ Nate fixed this in 035c722.
content.html: While reviewing pull request #1212, we observed some seg-faults during transport teardown when running the gz model -m <model_name> -p command. The backtrace is here and implicates TopicManager::Fini at line 86. Nate fixed this in 035c722.
